itunes:title: RHOC Book Launch + ðŸ‘‘SNOOKI (MTV's Jersey Shore)!
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Orange County, which featured a book launch, Heather's tab, Nicole's phone purse, and Hip in the sauna with a sub. After the recap, Danny chats with Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi from MTV's Jersey Shore, which celebrates its 100th episode this week on MTV (Thursday night)! Snooki discusses joining RHONJ, Sammi returning, her relationship with her costars, favorite looks and moments from the original series run, and so much more!


SNOOKI Interview: 33:20ish
